title: FS. T206 SGC Old Mill and Cycle
author: Joem36

posts.post_title: FS. T206 SGC Old Mill and Cycle
posts.post_content:
Hi, up for sale are 4 SGC graded cards. Two have Old Mill backs and the other two have Cycle backs. I would like payment with a paypal gift. I will pay for the shipping. My e-mail address is [url]lisajoe97@yahoo.com[/url].

SGC 60 OM Jake Pfeister (seated) $110
SGC 50 OM Sherry Magee (With Bat).......SOLD
SGC 30 Cycle Charlie Star (someone in pencil write a small number 2 on back).......SOLD
SGC 20 Cycle Jap Barbeau $85

Thanks
Joe
